LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.0.label: sky-high expectations
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.0.description: This place is really rich. I should be made very comfortable here.
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.1.label: high expectations
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.1.description: This place is almost rich. There's no reason I shouldn't have the things I want.
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.2.label: moderate expectations
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.2.description: This place isn't quite rich. I can't expect to be totally pampered.
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.3.label: low expectations
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.3.description: This place doesn't have the wealth for many luxuries. I can't expect great comforts.
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.4.label: very low expectations
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.4.description: This place is poverty-stricken. I need to keep myself strong to survive.
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.5.label: extremely low expectations
LanguageData.LowExpectations.stages.5.description: There's nothing here to make me comfortable. I'd better steel myself to survive.
